div.head: Ward Repository
div.p: Ward is a digital service that collects, preserves, and distributes digital learning and teaching material. Content Repositories such as Ward facilitate collaboration and re-use.

Ward is intended to be highly customisable towards the needs of communities of users. If you are interested in setting up communities and collections on Ward, contact Rob Talbot r.j.talbot@warwick.ac.uk (Digital Development Manager, Library)
